title: Command Injection
description: The code constructs a command string using user input without proper sanitization or validation, which can lead to command injection.
fix: Validate and sanitize the user input before constructing the command string. Use parameterized commands or avoid directly embedding user input into shell commands.

reasoning.pattern: User input is directly concatenated into a command string without validation.
reasoning.exploit_example: An attacker could inject malicious commands by manipulating the payload file path.
